The objective of the game is to collect words representing lyrics of a song. Words are represented by place markers on a map, by clicking them you acquire the corresponding word. You can see the words collected and guess the song. Correct answers are rewarded with game points.

NEW GAME button is for starting new game in case you want to start from scratch. CONTINUE button is for continuing previous game or even start a new if no game is in progress. FOUND WORDS button is for displaying found words and also getting hints or trying to guess the current song. SELECT SONG button is for selecting which song (by number) you are going to play and viewing already found songs. SETTINGS button is for selecting game difficulty and mode.

In the bottom of the screen you can see your score, the distance you walked while playing the game, the current selected difficulty and the number of the song you currently trying to find. The information icon is for further explanation about the scoring system.
5 different markers representing the important of the word.

When you click a marker you collect a word. If you are in near mode you have to be 5 meters the marker. If the word is collected a message will appear indicate that the word is added to bag. To view previously collected words you can click on the bag icon at the bottom right of the map screen or go to FOUND WORDS from home.

There are Five Different Difficulty Levels:
 Each has an information button for further explanation.
 According to your choice the variety of markers types on the map change and their quantity. Also each has a different weight on final score.
 50 Very Hard, 40 Hard, 30 Normal, 20 Easy, 10 Very easy.

There are two Different Modes:
 Near Mode indicates that you must be at least 5 meters near the marker to collect the word.
 Anywhere Mode indicates that you can select the marker from anywhere.
 Finding Solution in near mode gives an extra 10 points bonus!
In Found Song Screen you can view the words you collected get hints, try to find the solution and if you want get the solution.
Words Collected are represented in a scrollable list.
There is an input text box where you can type your Solution and then you can see if its right by pressing the submit solution button.
If you are really stuck you can press the Get Solution button and get the answer but you will not be awarded any points. If you want you can select a different song and come back later.
Also there is a hint button for getting current song\'s artist but be careful hints cost 5 points.
In Song Selection you can select whatever song represented by a number at the grid. Currently selected Song is indicated with a light blue colour.
Previously found Songs are indicated by a tick mark next to their corresponding number in the grid.
Also at the bottom of the screen the previously selected song is represented to let you know the previous one so you can continue your game if after you change your option you regret it.
After a song is found a message pop up asking how you want to continue you can either come to Song Selection screen and select whatever song or you can play the next song in line.
You can view the already found Songs and play them in Youtube!!
In Song Selection there is a button on the bottom of the Screen with text "FOUND SONGS PLAYER". When this button is pressed the Song Player Screen is opened.
Found Songs are presented in a List on the Song Player Screen.
You can press any Song of the Found Song List. After you press a Song, Youtube opens on the selected song. You can then return to the game from where you left by pressing the back button.
